project_id.description: ID of the project to which the issue belongs.

created_at.description: Date and time when the issue was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the issue was last updated.

closed_at.description: Date and time when the issue was closed.

assignees.description: List of users assigned to the issue.

user_notes_count.description: Number of user notes added to the issue.

merge_requests_count.description: Number of merge requests associated with the issue.

upvotes.description: Number of upvotes for the issue.

downvotes.description: Number of downvotes for the issue.

due_date.description: Due date set for the issue.

confidential.description: Indicates if the issue is confidential.

discussion_locked.description: Indicates if discussion is locked for the issue.

web_url.description: URL of the issue in GitLab.

time_stats.description: Time statistics related to the issue.

task_completion_status.description: Task completion status for the issue.

blocking_issues_count.description: Number of blocking issues for this issue.

has_tasks.description: Indicates if the issue has tasks.

_links.description: Links related to the GitLab issue.

moved_to_id.description: ID of the issue to which this issue has been moved.

service_desk_reply_to.description: Service desk reply to information for the issue.

author.description: Details of the author of the issue.

web_url.description: URL of the author's GitLab profile.

avatar_url.description: URL of the author's avatar image.

locked.description: Indicates if the author's account is locked.

author_id.description: ID of the author of the issue.

assignee.description: Details of the user assigned to the issue.

web_url.description: URL of the assignee's GitLab profile.

avatar_url.description: URL of the assignee's avatar image.

locked.description: Indicates if the assignee account is locked.

assignee_id.description: ID of the user assigned to the issue.

closed_by.description: Details of the user who closed the issue.

state.description: State of the user's account who closed the issue.

name.description: Name of the user who closed the issue.

web_url.description: URL of the user's GitLab profile who closed the issue.

avatar_url.description: URL of the user's avatar image.

username.description: Username of the user who closed the issue.

human_readable_end_date.description: Human-readable end date of the user.

id.description: ID of the user who closed the issue.

locked.description: Indicates if the user's account is locked.

closed_by_id.description: ID of the user who closed the issue.

milestone_id.description: ID of the milestone associated with the issue.

subscribed.description: Indicates if the user is subscribed to the issue.

task_status.description: Status of tasks associated with the issue.

iteration.description: Details of the iteration to which the issue belongs.

group_id.description: ID of the group to which the iteration belongs.

created_at.description: Date and time when the iteration was created.

updated_at.description: Date and time when the iteration was last updated.

due_date.description: Due date set for the iteration.

web_url.description: URL of the iteration in GitLab.

epic.description: Details of the epic to which the issue belongs.

url.description: URL of the epic in GitLab.

group_id.description: ID of the group to which the epic belongs.

locked.description: Indicates if the epic is locked.

human_readable_end_date.description: Human-readable end date of the epic.

epic_iid.description: Internal ID of the epic the issue belongs to.
